thread.title: Contemporary funk near Times Square
thread.title_full: Contemporary funk near Times Square - Review of Row NYC Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kimberly M
title: Contemporary funk near Times Square
text: Friendly and Helpful staff in a great location. Rooms are clean and comfortable with all the amenities. You are close to the entertainment center of the city with dozens of theatre within minutes on foot. Restaurants, shopping and sight seeing steps away.
